dct_title_s: Tabulæ Peutingerianæ Segmentum VII à Parnacis usque ad Paralocas Schythas
dct_alternative_sm: Tabvlæ Pevtingerianæ Segmentvm VII à Parnacis vsque ad Paralocas Schythas
Segmentum VIII à Paralocis Schythis usque ad finem Asiæ
Segmentvm VIII à Paralocis Schythis vsque ad finem Asiæ
dct_description_sm: Maps are part of the "Peutinger table", which represents the imperial roads and posts throughout the Roman Empire at about 250 A.D.
North oriented toward left of sheet.
Jansson's Peutinger table was reprinted in various editions of Accuratissima Orbis antiqui delineatio and in later editions edited by Georg Horn. Map also appeared in Jansson's Novus atlas.
Appears in Jansson's Accuratissima Orbis antiqui delineatio, Amsterdam, 1652.
